We need to force an AS/400 connection in any case.
At the moment there are three special user accounts namely
If one of these, we "think" that we are not yet connected and try to logon.
Maybe the gw offers an function here which with we could check for an existing
connection ? Would free us from hard-coding usernames.

20-MAY-2003 AS, request pro forma session ID to guarantee that there's a key
container generated by the CSP. This will avoid problems in HellerLogin
(Internet) when user never did any cryptographic actions before.
